resources.string: 30 Days of Wellness
Drink a glass of water first thing in the morning
Start your day by hydrating your body to boost metabolism and flush out toxins.
Take the stairs
Use stairs instead of elevators to incorporate more physical activity into your daily routine.
Make half your plate veggies
Increase your intake of vitamins, minerals, and fiber by filling half your plate with vegetables.
Get a fitness tracker and track your steps
Using a fitness tracker helps you stay motivated and ensure you get enough daily movement.
Switch to non-toxic household cleaning products
Reduce your exposure to harmful chemicals by using eco-friendly and natural cleaning products.
Use non-toxic skincare and personal care products
Protect your skin by choosing products free from harmful chemicals and artificial ingredients.
Take a probiotic daily
Support your gut health and digestion by consuming probiotics regularly.
Eat real food
Focus on whole, unprocessed foods for better overall health and nutrition.
Stand up every 30 minutes while working
Avoid prolonged sitting by standing up and stretching every 30 minutes to improve circulation.
Get sunlight every day
Exposure to natural sunlight helps boost vitamin D levels and improve mood.
Fill your home with houseplants
Houseplants improve air quality and create a more relaxing environment.
Sweat each day
Engage in physical activities that make you sweat to detoxify your body.
Have a daily green smoothie
Boost your nutrition by drinking a smoothie filled with greens and healthy ingredients.
Go to bed earlier
Prioritize sleep by going to bed early for better energy and overall health.
Plan your meals
Meal planning helps you eat healthier and save time during the week.
Find a fitness buddy
Stay motivated and accountable by working out with a friend.
Make time for self-care
Prioritize activities that relax and recharge you, such as reading or meditation.
Put your phone away before bed
Avoid blue light exposure before sleep to improve sleep quality.
Take a prebiotic daily
Prebiotics help nourish the good bacteria in your gut, improving digestion.
Practice deep breathing
Deep breathing helps reduce stress and promotes relaxation.
Eat the rainbow
Consume a variety of colorful fruits and vegetables for a balanced diet.
Chew your food thoroughly
Proper chewing aids digestion and helps your body absorb nutrients more effectively.
Practice gratitude
Take time each day to reflect on things you\'re grateful for to boost happiness.
Stop eating before you\'re full
Eat mindfully and stop before feeling completely full to avoid overeating.
Find a creative outlet
Engage in creative activities like painting, writing, or playing music to reduce stress.
Make time to stretch
Stretching improves flexibility and helps prevent injuries.
Spend time in nature
Being in nature can reduce stress, improve mood, and boost overall well-being.
Read ingredient labels
Check labels to make informed choices about the food and products you consume.
Practice good dental hygiene
Brush and floss daily to maintain healthy teeth and gums.
Laugh often
Laughter reduces stress and improves overall happiness.
Get a houseplant
Having plants in your home can purify the air and create a calming environment.
